short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the cold outreach process on Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Orbit Outreach extension automates the time-intensive and cumbersome process of conducting cold outreach on Facebook. The extension allows the user to single-handedly execute outreach campaigns using message sequences single-handedly, saving the user tons of time and effort and allowing them to reach out to more potential customers for their business.
